meta_description: Visit the Center for Photographic Art today! Our historic contemporary fine art photography gallery is in Carmel California and showcases rotating exhibits of works from innovators in the field. In person viewing is free and open to the public: photographers, collectors, and art enthusiasts alike wi
admission_text:
[ Join Now! ](https://photography.app.neoncrm.com/forms/membership)

Thank you for becoming a member of the Center for Photographic Art. Your incredible support helps us fulfill our mission and achieve our goals. Your membership significantly benefits our photographic community by allowing us to continue our high-quality exhibitions, educational workshops, beautiful publications, and inspiring lectures as well fund our grants, awards, and scholarships. These programs would not be possible without the faith and support of members like you.

# Membership Levels

* * *

## Basic Memberships

All memberships include:

  * Free access to online Artist Lectures 

  * Eligibility to enter CPA’s annual Members’ Juried Exhibit

  * Discounts on selected workshops, events, juried exhibition entry fees,  
and our Fine Art Print Program images 

  * Access to Portfolio Reviews with CPA’s Executive Director

  * Promotion of your significant accomplishments and awards on the CPA website 

  * 10% discount on every order storewide at [Frame Destination](https://www.framedestination.com/info/artist-discounts.html). 

Basic Membership Annual Membership:

Individual: $50  
Couple: $75  
Senior (65+): $40  
Senior Family: $60  
Student / Teacher: $25

[ Join with a Basic Membership ](https://photography.app.neoncrm.com/forms/membership)

* * *

## Friends of Photography Membership

All the above basic membership benefits, plus:

  * A featured page on CPA’s exclusive Friends of Photography Mem...
collections_text:
[ ](https://www.photography.org/events/deadbeat-club-press-the-californians)

[ ](https://www.photography.org/events/call-for-entries-2025-cpa-members-juried-exhibition-srp48)

[ ](https://www.photography.org/debi-lorenc)

**Welcome to the Center for Photographic Art (CPA) –** Tracing our roots back to the Friends of Photography, founded in 1967, we remain the second oldest members’ photography gallery space in the country. A short walk from Ocean Avenue in Carmel, California brings you to the venerable gallery originally occupied by the Friends of Photography, launched by iconic artists Ansel Adams, Cole Weston, and Wynn Bullock. Today, the CPA continues to serve as a valuable asset to its members, the community, and the greater world of the photographic arts.
